title: SCP-3420-JP
content:
[[include :scp-jp:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:ouroborous-theme]]

[[include :scp-jp-sandbox2:inc:headsubtitle | title=SCiPNET Anti-Piracy System]]
　
　
　

= 無許可での閲覧継続を確認
= ##000000|WARNING##
= 閲覧者の情報を取得しています...
= ##000000|WARNING##
= 財団データベースを参照...    ##FF0000|該当者なし##
= [[size 150%]]##000000|WARNING##[[/size]]
= ##000000|WARNING##
= ##000000|WARNING##
= ##000000|WARNING##
= ##000000|WARNING##
= [[size 200%]]**##FF0000|最　終　警　告##**[[/size]]
= **##FF0000|不正閲覧が検出されました##**

ユーザー名
[[include :topia:listusers-1 users="."]]
##red|%%name%%##
[[include :topia:listusers-2]]
##blue|ゲスト##
[[include :topia:listusers-3]]
----
= あなたが閲覧している報告書はRAISAによる閲覧認証を受けていません
= 無許可での報告書閲覧は財団に対する重大な反逆行為です
= この警告を無視した場合、著作権保護規定に基づき閲覧者は終了されます
 
= [[size 200%]]**##FF0000|直ちにSCiP.NET.との接続を切断せよ##**[[/size]]
= ##000000|WARNING##
= ##000000|WARNING##
= ##000000|WARNING##
  
= [[size 200%]]**##FF0000|FINAL WARNING##**[[/size]]
= **##FF0000|Unauthorized viewing detected##**

Username
[[include :topia:listusers-1 users="."]]
##red|%%name%%##
[[include :topia:listusers-2]]
##blue|Guest##
[[include :topia:listusers-3]]
----
= The report you are viewing has not been authenticated for viewing by RAISA.
= Report reading in the impermissibility is a serious treason act for the foundation.
= If this warning is ignored, the visitor will be terminated in accordance 
= with the Copyright Protection Regulations.
= [[size 200%]]**##FF0000|Disconnect from SCiP.NET. immediately##**[[/size]]
= ##000000|WARNING##
= ##000000|WARNING##
= ##000000|WARNING##

= SCiP.NET.との接続を切断しますか？
=  Do you disconnect from SCiP.NET.?
= ##000000|WARNING##
[[a_ href="http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/scp-3420-jp/offset/0"]]▶ はい (YES)[[/a]]
 ##000000|WARNING##
[[a_ href="http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/scp-3420-jp/offset/2"]]▶ いいえ (No)[[/a]]
##000000|WARNING##
